Description: Oval handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to sharp turn. Clay near fine pink-buff; white inclusions; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Leontidas. Trimmed. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 085.28.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1119)
